languages.text: "Когда я прибыл на {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Святую Терру{/g} и был подвергнут испытаниями, то был признан подходящим материалом для становления санкционированным псайкером, способным подчинить свое проклятие собственной воле. Могу заверить, что адепты {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Астра Телепатика{/g} не ошиблись в своей оценке".

traits.locale_text: "Когда я прибыл на {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Святую Терру{/g} и был подвергнут испытаниями, то был признан подходящим материалом для становления санкционированным псайкером, способным подчинить свое проклятие собственной воле. Могу заверить, что адепты {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Астра Телепатика{/g} не ошиблись в своей оценке".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "When I arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} and was tested, I was found to be suitable material for becoming a sanctioned psyker, able to bend his curse to his own will. I can assure you that the adepts of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} were right in their assessment."
languages.original_text: "Когда я прибыл на {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Святую Терру{/g} и был подвергнут испытаниями, то был признан подходящим материалом для становления санкционированным псайкером, способным подчинить свое проклятие собственной воле. Могу заверить, что адепты {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Астра Телепатика{/g} не ошиблись в своей оценке".

traits.locale_text: "When I arrived on Holy Terra and was tested, I was found to be suitable material for becoming a sanctioned psyker, able to bend his curse to his own will. I can assure you that the adepts of the Astra Telepathica were right in their assessment."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When I arrived on Holy Terra and was tested, I was found to be suitable material for becoming a sanctioned psyker, able to bend his curse to his own will. I can assure you that the adepts of the Astra Telepathica were right in their assessment."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When I arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} and was tested, I was found to be suitable material for becoming a sanctioned psyker, able to bend his curse to his own will. I can assure you that the adepts of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} were right in their assessment."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When I arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} and was tested, I was found to be suitable material for becoming a sanctioned psyker, able to bend his curse to his own will. I can assure you that the adepts of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} were right in their assessment."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “当我抵达{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}神圣泰拉{/g}，接受测试时，{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}帝国星语庭{/g}的导师们认为我可以成为合法灵能者，因为我可以依照我自己的意愿来发动能力。我可以向你保证，他们的评估是正确的。”
languages.original_text: "When I arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} and was tested, I was found to be suitable material for becoming a sanctioned psyker, able to bend his curse to his own will. I can assure you that the adepts of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} were right in their assessment."

traits.locale_text: “当我抵达{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}神圣泰拉{/g}，接受测试时，{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}帝国星语庭{/g}的导师们认为我可以成为获得授权的灵能者，因为我可以依照我自己的意愿来发动能力。我可以向你保证，他们的评估是正确的。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "When I arrived on Holy Terra and was tested, I was found to be suitable material for becoming a sanctioned psyker, able to bend his curse to his own will. I can assure you that the adepts of the Astra Telepathica were right in their assessment."

languages.text: «Cuando llegué a la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sagrada Terra{/g} y se me sometió a las pruebas, resulté ser buen candidato para convertirme en psíquico autorizado, al ser capaz de doblegar mi maldición. Puedo asegurarle que los adeptos del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} estaban en lo correcto».
languages.original_text: "When I arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} and was tested, I was found to be suitable material for becoming a sanctioned psyker, able to bend his curse to his own will. I can assure you that the adepts of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} were right in their assessment."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando llegué a la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sagrada Terra{/g} y se me sometió a las pruebas, resulté ser buen candidato para convertirme en psíquico autorizado, al ser capaz de doblegar mi maldición. Puedo asegurarle que los adeptos del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} estaban en lo correcto».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}聖なる地球{/g}に到着して試験を受けたとき、私は呪いを自分の意志に従わせることのでき認定異能者になるのに適した素材であると判断された。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}アストラ・テレパシカ{/g}の修練者たちの評価は正しかったと断言できる」
languages.original_text: "When I arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} and was tested, I was found to be suitable material for becoming a sanctioned psyker, able to bend his curse to his own will. I can assure you that the adepts of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} were right in their assessment."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}聖なる地球{/g}に到着して試験を受けたとき、私は呪いを自分の意志に従わせることのでき認定異能者になるのに適した素材であると判断された。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}アストラ・テレパシカ{/g}の修練者たちの評価は正しかったと断言できる」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Als ich im {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Heiligen Terra{/g} ankam und geprüft wurde, erkannte man in mir das Potenzial zum sanktionierten Psioniker, der seinen Fluch seinem eigenen Willen beugen kann. Ich kann Euch versichern, dass die Adepten der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} mit ihrer Einschätzung richtig lagen."
languages.original_text: "When I arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} and was tested, I was found to be suitable material for becoming a sanctioned psyker, able to bend his curse to his own will. I can assure you that the adepts of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} were right in their assessment."

traits.locale_text: "Als ich im {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Heiligen Terra{/g} ankam und geprüft wurde, erkannte man in mir das Potenzial zum sanktionierten Psioniker, der seinen Fluch seinem eigenen Willen beugen kann. Ich kann Euch versichern, dass die Adepten der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} mit ihrer Einschätzung richtig lagen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Quand je suis arrivé sur la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sainte Terra{/g}, on m'a fait passer des tests qui ont permis de déterminer que j'étais apte à soumettre cette malédiction à ma volonté et, par conséquent, à devenir un psyker assermenté. Je peux vous assurer que les adeptes de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} ne se sont pas trompés. »
languages.original_text: "When I arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} and was tested, I was found to be suitable material for becoming a sanctioned psyker, able to bend his curse to his own will. I can assure you that the adepts of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} were right in their assessment."

traits.locale_text: « Quand je suis arrivé sur la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sainte Terra{/g}, on m'a fait passer des tests qui ont permis de déterminer que j'étais apte à soumettre cette malédiction à ma volonté et, par conséquent, à devenir un psyker assermenté. Je peux vous assurer que les adeptes de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} ne se sont pas trompés. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Kutsal Terra'da{/g} yapılan testlerin ardından onaylı ruhsezer olmaya uygun bulundum. Lanetime söz geçirebildim. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} üstatlarının doğru karar verdiği konusunda seni temin edebilirim."
languages.original_text: "When I arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g} and was tested, I was found to be suitable material for becoming a sanctioned psyker, able to bend his curse to his own will. I can assure you that the adepts of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} were right in their assessment."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Kutsal Terra{/g}'da yapılan testlerin ardından onaylı ruhsezer olmaya uygun bulundum. Lanetime söz geçirebiliyordum. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstraTelepathica}Astra Telepathica{/g} üstatlarının doğru karar verdiği konusunda seni temin edebilirim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
